content: **yarn** 130 yards of dk weight yarn we used 1 skein of shibui nest in abyss **needles** us 7 / 4 5 mm 16 circulars **or equivalent type & length in size needed to obtain gauge** **notions** 2 different colored stitch markers darning needle scissors and tape measure **gauge** 5 stitches & 8 row per inch in broken rib after blocking **sizes** one size though instructions are given in pattern to adjust length **measurements** 14 5 around neck 26 around at base 7 tall
